de: Wir verwenden reines Wasser aus dem Doux, um unsere Forellen zu züchten. Bei uns nehmen sich die Fische Zeit zum Wachsen. Sie werden mit hochwertigem Futter gefüttert. Kommen Sie und kaufen Sie sie direkt bei der Fischfarm, sie ist täglich geöffnet!
ru:
It is in a natural and preserved environment that we propose to you to spend a moment of relaxation and leisure at the edge of water.
For your comfort, tables are available for picnics, and you can rent a plancha if you wish to eat your fish fresh on the spot.
You can come and fish every day, all year round. We lend you the necessary equipment.
en: We use pure water from the Doux to raise our trout. With us, the fish take the time to grow. They are fed with quality food. Come and buy them directly at the fish farm, it's open every day!
it: Usiamo l'acqua pura del Doux per allevare le nostre trote. Con noi, i pesci si prendono il tempo per crescere. Sono nutriti con cibo di qualità. Vieni ad acquistarli direttamente in pescheria, è aperto tutti i giorni!
fr: Nous utilisons l'eau pure du Doux pour élever nos truites. Chez nous, les poissons prennent le temps de grandir. Il sont nourris avec des aliments de qualité. Venez les acheter directement à la pisciculture, c'est ouvert tous les jours!
nl: We gebruiken zuiver water uit de Doux om onze forel te kweken. Bij ons nemen de vissen de tijd om te groeien. Ze worden gevoerd met kwaliteitsvoer. Kom ze direct bij de viskwekerij kopen, deze is elke dag open!equipment.
zh:
It is in a natural and preserved environment that we propose to you to spend a moment of relaxation and leisure at the edge of water.
For your comfort, tables are available for picnics, and you can rent a plancha if you wish to eat your fish fresh on the spot.
You can come and fish every day, all year round. We lend you the necessary equipment.
es:
It is in a natural and preserved environment that we propose to you to spend a moment of relaxation and leisure at the edge of water.
For your comfort, tables are available for picnics, and you can rent a plancha if you wish to eat your fish fresh on the spot.
You can come and fish every day, all year round. We lend you the necessary equipment.
